overview: You've never seen an NFL game day look or sound like this before!  Join NFL Films for an amazing 45 minutes of unforgettable NFL action set to the music of today's hottest rock 'n' roll artists. Be in the locker room before the game, on the field for the opening kickoff, feel the impact of the hits, the struggle in the pits - and that's just the first half!  As the players go to the locker room for halftime, stay in your seat for a rockin' halftime show and a follies- filled second half kickoff. As the game nears its dramatic end, you'll feel the pressure build as you witness a great come-from-behind victory and cheer along in a post game celebration.  It's the NFL like you've never seen it before!
title: NFL Rocks
